item.title: Viaggio 1050 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 9, 2025

Viaggio 1050 v1.0 ETS2

The Marcopolo Viaggio 1050 is a very popular bus model, and like the CMA 2K19, it’s a frequent subject of mods for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). These mods allow players to drive this iconic bus within the game, often with a high level of detail and customization.

What is the Viaggio 1050 Mod?
The Viaggio 1050 mod brings the Marcopolo Viaggio 1050, a well-known intercity bus from the Brazilian manufacturer Marcopolo, into ETS2. Modders strive to replicate the bus’s features realistically, including:
Detailed 3D Model: Accurate exterior and interior modeling, often including animated doors, windows, and luggage compartments.
Realistic Physics and Handling: Designed to mimic how a real bus of this type would feel to drive.
Authentic Sounds: Custom sound effects for the engine (often for various chassis like Mercedes-Benz, Scania, or Volvo), brakes, and other bus operations.
Customization: Many mods offer a wide range of options, such as:
Skins (liveries): Replicas of real-world bus company paint schemes, often from Brazilian companies.
Interior Variations: Different seat patterns, dashboard layouts, and interior lighting.
Accessories: GPS units, curtains, destination signs, and sometimes even animated passengers.
Chassis Options: Allowing you to choose between different real-world bus chassis that the Viaggio 1050 might be built upon (e.g., Mercedes-Benz O500RS, Scania K310/K360).
Compatibility: Mod creators regularly update their Viaggio 1050 mods to ensure they work with the latest versions of ETS2. You’ll find versions compatible with ETS2 1.49, 1.50, and likely newer versions as they are released.

Installation Process (General Steps):
Download the .scs file(s) for the Viaggio 1050 mod.
Move these files to your ETS2 mod folder, which is typically located at Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod.
Launch Euro Truck Simulator 2.
From the main menu, select “Mod Manager.”
Enable the Viaggio 1050 mod (and any required accessory mods like sound packs) by moving it from the left column to the right. Make sure to check the load order if multiple mods interact.
Confirm your changes and load your game profile.
Once in the game, you’ll usually need to go to a bus dealer (or truck dealer, depending on how the mod is set up) to purchase the Viaggio 1050.

Key Points for Using Bus Mods in ETS2
Game Version: Always verify that the mod you download is compatible with your current version of Euro Truck Simulator 2. Using an outdated or incompatible mod can lead to game crashes.

Mod Conflicts: Sometimes, multiple mods can conflict with each other. If you experience issues, try disabling other mods to see if the Viaggio 1050 works correctly on its own.

Credits: club rotas

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: CMA 2K19 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 9, 2025

CMA 2K19 v1.0 ETS2

The “CMA 2K19” you’re referring to is likely a bus mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). These mods are very popular in the ETS2 community, especially in Brazil, and allow players to drive various bus models with detailed interiors, realistic sounds, and custom animations.

Here’s what you should know about the CMA 2K19 ETS2 mod:

What is the CMA 2K19 Mod?
The CMA 2K19 mod brings a specific bus model, often referred to as “CMA Flecha,” into Euro Truck Simulator 2. These mods are typically created by third-party developers and aim to provide a highly immersive driving experience for bus enthusiasts within the game. They often feature:

Detailed Interiors: Realistic dashboards, animated pedals, and openable doors/windows.
Authentic Sounds: Engine sounds, horn, and other bus-specific audio.
Customization Options: Different skins (liveries), interior upholstery, GPS positions, and even options for open or closed cabins.
Compatibility: These mods are regularly updated to work with newer versions of ETS2. For example, some versions of the CMA Flecha mod are compatible with ETS2 versions 1.51.x, 1.52.x, 1.53.x, 1.54.x, and 1.55.x.

To install a mod, you usually need to:
Download the mod file: This is usually a .scs file.
Place it in your ETS2 mod folder: This is typically located at Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod.

Activate the mod in-game:
Start Euro Truck Simulator 2.
From the main menu, go to “Mod Manager.”
Find the CMA 2K19 mod in the list and enable it (usually by double-clicking or moving it to the active mods column).
Confirm your changes.
You may need to create a new profile or purchase the bus from a dealer in-game, depending on the mod’s specifics.

Important Considerations
Compatibility: Always check the mod’s description for compatibility with your current ETS2 game version. Using an incompatible mod can cause crashes or glitches.

Performance: Some highly detailed mods can impact game performance, especially on lower-end PCs.

Credits: club rotas

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Increased Road Speed Limits v1.55.250709 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 9, 2025

Increased Road Speed Limits v1.55.250709 ETS2

The speed limit is 110-140 km/h. On motorways and toll roads.;
The speed limit is 80-130 km/h. On expressways;
The speed limit is 80-100 km/h. – On local roads;
The speed limit is 50 km/h. In urban areas;
In some areas, there may be lower and other speed limits on the roads, as they are defined directly on the map, which is beyond the scope of this mod.
Please note that each country has its own rules for speed limits on the roads. For example, Latvia limits the maximum speed to 90 km/h for all types of its roads, whereas in Germany the speed limit for local roads is 90 km/h and for trucks the speed limit is 140 km/h on expressways and motorways.

Changes:
Fixed the speed limit for heavy vehicles on motorways in Romania.
Fixed the speed limit for heavy trucks in urban and rural areas in Sweden

Credits: madman

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: SibirMap v2.10.2 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 9, 2025

SibirMap v2.10.2 ETS2

Version – 2.10.2.
+ Adaptation for game version 1.55.
– Fixed errors and bugs.

v2.10.1 .
– Adaptation for game version 1.54.

V2.10.0.
– Added Omsk.
– Completed R-402 Tyumen-Omsk highway, added territory from Ishim to Omsk, added settlements Abatskoye, Krutinka, Tyukalinsk.
– Minor edits were made throughout the map.
– More than 100 unique objects for this version.
– Expanded pack of high-quality graphic elements for company design from Dragon`s Design studio.

Credits: 10avoid
